com.scarcolo.eventour.model.event.EventResponse

Packages that use EventResponse
Package
Description
com.scarcolo.eventour.controller.event
Provides the various controller for dialogate with the api regarding the events
com.scarcolo.eventour.model.event
it provides the models on which the various classes are based to communicate with the database and to provide the answers by formatting them, regarding the events
com.scarcolo.eventour.model.manager
Provides the models on which the various classes are based to communicate with the database and to provide the answers by formatting them, regarding the managers
com.scarcolo.eventour.service.event
Provides the services of the application, that is, the links and the logic that processes the requests and returns the responses by formatting them, regarding the events.
